headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com https://www.gstatic.com 'unsafe-inline'; frame-src https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com; img-src 'self' data: blob: https://i.ytimg.com https://*.ytimg.com; media-src 'self' blob: https://*.googlevideo.com https://*.youtube.com; connect-src 'self' https://www.youtube.com https://*.googlevideo.com https://i.ytimg.com;
